Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides a list of 20 creative scavenger hunt ideas for kids, including indoor, outdoor, nature, art, reading, and shape-themed hunts. The scavenger hunts can be adapted to different situations and interests and can be tailored to the skill level of the children. The article suggests starting with the location and figuring out appropriate themes, such as colors or seasonal items. The scavenger hunts can be used as a fun and educational activity for toddlers or tweens. 
 
 Links: ['Search (https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/search/)', ' (https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/life/parenting/g32050844/scavenger-hunt-ideas-for-kids/)', 'Subscribe (https://shop.goodhousekeeping.com/good-housekeeping-all-access-membership.html?source=panelnav&cds_tracking_code=panelnav)', 'My Articles (https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/my-stuff/)', 'GH+ Member Portal (https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/life/a32304894/gh-plus-member-portal/)']

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: To obtain user access tokens for Twitter API, one can use the 3-legged OAuth flow, which involves creating a request for a consumer application to obtain a request token, having the user authenticate and send the consumer application a request token, and converting the request token into a usable user access token. The obtained access tokens can be used to perform actions on behalf of the user, such as creating tweets. 
 
 Links: ['Skip to main content (https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/authentication/oauth-1-0a/obtaining-user-access-tokens#twtr-main)', 'Developer Platform (https://developer.twitter.com/content/developer-twitter/en)', 'Documentation (https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs)', 'Getting started (https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/platform-overview)', 'Developer Apps (https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/apps)']
